original_title: Vivendo, cantando, che male ti fò?
overview: The voice of one of his former classmates studying singing causes an irresistible itch for a wealthy industrialist. The cause is an old aversion that the industrialist has for the singer: he can only heal by overcoming this aversion and transforming himself into a benefactor of the hated ex-partner.
title: Vivendo, cantando, che male ti fò?
